00002     main_mfcc.cpp - main routine for MFCC module

00008     sumandeep.banerjee@gmail.com

00010 
00015 // standard include files
00016 #include <stdio.h>
00017 #include <stdlib.h>
00018 #include <string.h>
00019 
00020 // projet include files
00021 #include "mfcc.h"
00022 
00023 // main_mfcc function
00024 int main (int argc, char * argv []) {
00025     MFCC mfcc1;
00026     Wave w1;
00027     char * infile, * outfile;
00028     short * waveData;
00029     double ** mfccData;
00030 
00031     // process command line parameters
00032     if (argc < 2 || argc > 3)
00033     {
00034                 printf ("Command line usage :- \nmfcc infile [timeframe = 23]\n");
00035         printf ("infile     : input file = infile.wav\n");
00036         printf ("timeframe  : temporal width (in milliseconds) of each MFCC frame generated\n");
00037         printf ("Generates mfcc output file = infile.mfcc\n");
00038         printf ("Note       : Do not provide the extentions. \n\t     .wav and .mfcc extentions are automatically appended");
00039                 exit (0);
00040     }
00041 
00042     infile = (char *) calloc (strlen (argv [1]) + 5, sizeof (char));
00043     strcpy (infile, argv [1]);
00044     strcat (infile, ".wav");
00045     outfile = (char *) calloc (strlen (argv [1]) + 6, sizeof (char));
00046     strcpy (outfile, argv [1]);
00047     strcat (outfile, ".mfcc");
00048 
00049     w1.waveRead(infile);
00050     waveData = (short *) calloc (w1.getNumChannels() * w1.getNumSamplesPerChannel(), sizeof (short));
00051     w1.waveLoad(0, w1.getNumSamplesPerChannel(), waveData);
00052     w1.waveDownmix(waveData, waveData);
00053 
00054     // call mfcc with user specified time frame
00055     if (argc == 3)
00056         mfcc1.MFCCcompute (waveData, w1.getSampleRate(), w1.getNumSamplesPerChannel(), mfccData, outfile, (long) atoi (argv [2]));
00057     // call mfcc with default time frame
00058     else
00059         mfcc1.MFCCcompute (waveData, w1.getSampleRate(), w1.getNumSamplesPerChannel(), mfccData, outfile);
00060 
00061     free (infile);
00062     free (outfile);
00063 
00064     return (0);
00065 } // end of main_mfcc function
